reviewText: My two year old granddaughter loves these DVDs. She has learned all the nursery rhymes.
Keeps my little one dancing.
Granddaughter has worn this out.
16 month old is mesmerized.  Love it.
Not the best picture but my daughter LOVES this dvd, and everything HooplaKidz!
My daughter loves Hooplakidz!!! Fast Delivery!
My son loves it
First saw this on now tv. It stopped working and as my son loved it so muched ordered from America. It was worth the wait. He loves it have tried others but these keep his attention like no others
Good

My child is ten months old, & he's been watching it since he was 2 months old. He's already repeating words and putting words together. I'm not saying it's because of hoopla kidz, because I spend a lot of time with him, but I highly recommend this series to all mothers. He loves them & gets so excited when they come on!
My son loves this DVD! Well worth the money!
My daughter loves it thanks
Granddaughter loves this! She was 2 and still watches it at 4 years old.
My 18 month old daughter loves to watch hoopla kidz in the car. It's her favourite shes even starting to learn all the words.
My baby loves it.  She learned how to sing a long.  We used it in the car DVD player and the baby loved it.
My daughter loves this!
Purchased to keep child amused for long car rides. Perfect for a two year old.
